00021 #define PUSH(proc, value) { \
00022     (proc)->sp = (uint32_t *) (proc)->sp - 1; \
00023     *((uint32_t *) (proc)->sp) = (uint32_t) (value); \
00024 }

00026 /* Declaration of the interrupt handler function
00027  */
00028 #if __GNUC__
00029 __attribute__((__interrupt__)) static void os_switch_context_int_handler(void);
00030 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00031 __interrupt static void os_switch_context_int_handler(void);
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 #if CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE == CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_COMPARE
00035     /* Setup functions to use the compare interrupt
00036      */
00037     void os_setup_scheduler(uint32_t cpu_freq_hz)
00038     {
00039         cpu_irq_disable();
00040         irq_initialize_vectors();
00041         irq_register_handler((__int_handler) os_switch_context_int_handler,
00042                 AVR32_CORE_COMPARE_IRQ, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY);
00043         Set_system_register(AVR32_COMPARE, cpu_freq_hz / CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ);
00044         Set_system_register(AVR32_COUNT, 0);
00045         cpu_irq_enable();
00046     }
00047 
00048     static inline void os_scheduler_clear_int(void) {
00049         Set_system_register(AVR32_COMPARE, Get_system_register(AVR32_COMPARE));
00050     }
00051 
00052     #define OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_GROUP AVR32_CORE_IRQ_GROUP
00053 
00054 #elif CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE == CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_RTC
00055     /* Setup functions to use the RTC interrupt
00056      */
00057     #include "rtc.h"
00058 
00059     void os_setup_scheduler(uint32_t pba_freq_hz)
00060     {
00061         cpu_irq_disable();
00062         irq_initialize_vectors();
00063         irq_register_handler((__int_handler) os_switch_context_int_handler,
00064                 AVR32_RTC_IRQ, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY);
00065         // fRTC = 115000 / 4 = 28750
00066         rtc_init(&AVR32_RTC, RTC_OSC_RC, 1);
00067         rtc_set_top_value(&AVR32_RTC, 28750 / CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ);
00068         rtc_enable_interrupt(&AVR32_RTC);
00069         rtc_enable(&AVR32_RTC);
00070         cpu_irq_enable();
00071     }
00072 
00073     static inline void os_scheduler_clear_int(void) {
00074         (&AVR32_RTC)->icr = AVR32_RTC_ICR_TOPI_MASK;
00075     }
00076 
00077     #define OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_GROUP AVR32_RTC_IRQ_GROUP
00078 
00079 #elif CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE == CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_TC
00080     /* Setup functions to use the TC interrupt
00081      */
00082     #include "tc.h"
00083 
00084     #define OS_SCHEDULER_TC_IRQ AVR32_TC_IRQ0
00085 
00086     void os_setup_scheduler(uint32_t pba_freq_hz)
00087     {
00088         volatile avr32_tc_t *tc = &AVR32_TC;
00089         tc_waveform_opt_t waveform_opt = {
00090             .channel = CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL,
00091             .bswtrg = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00092             .beevt = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00093             .bcpc = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00094             .bcpb = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00095             .aswtrg = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00096             .aeevt = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00097             .acpc = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00098             .acpa = TC_EVT_EFFECT_NOOP,
00099             .wavsel = TC_WAVEFORM_SEL_UP_MODE_RC_TRIGGER,
00100             .enetrg = false,
00101             .eevt = 0,
00102             .eevtedg = TC_SEL_NO_EDGE,
00103             .cpcdis = false,
00104             .cpcstop = false,
00105             .burst = false,
00106             .clki = false,
00107             .tcclks = TC_CLOCK_SOURCE_TC3
00108         };
00109         tc_interrupt_t tc_interrupt = {
00110             .etrgs = 0,
00111             .ldrbs = 0,
00112             .ldras = 0,
00113             .cpcs = 1,
00114             .cpbs = 0,
00115             .cpas = 0,
00116             .lovrs = 0,
00117             .covfs = 0,
00118         };
00119         cpu_irq_disable();
00120         irq_initialize_vectors();
00121         irq_register_handler((__int_handler) os_switch_context_int_handler,
00122                 OS_SCHEDULER_TC_IRQ, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY);
00123         tc_init_waveform(tc, &waveform_opt);
00124         tc_write_rc(tc, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL,
00125                 (pba_freq_hz + 4 * CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ) / (8 * CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ));
00126         tc_configure_interrupts(tc, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL,
00127                 &tc_interrupt);
00128         tc_start(tc, CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL);
00129         cpu_irq_enable();
00130     }

00132     static inline void os_scheduler_clear_int(void) {

00134     }

00145 #if __GNUC__
00146 __attribute__((__naked__))
00147 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00148     #pragma shadow_registers = full
00149 #endif
00150 ISR(os_switch_context_int_handler, OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_GROUP,
00151         CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY)
00152 {
00153     extern struct os_process *os_current_process;
00154 
00155     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00156         // Save context
00157             "pushm r0-r7\n\t"
00158 
00159         // Save the stack pointer
00160         "mov r0, os_current_process\n\t"
00161         "ld.w r1, r0[0]\n\t"
00162         "st.w r1[0], sp\n\t"
00163     );
00164 
00165     HOOK_OS_STATISTICS_SWITCH_CONTEXT_START(42);
00166 
00167     // Clear the interrupt flag
00168     os_scheduler_clear_int();
00169     os_switch_context_int_handler_hook();
00170 
00171     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00172         // Update the stack pointer
00173         "ld.w sp, r12\n\t"
00174 
00175         // Restore context
00176         "popm r0-r7\n\t"
00177     );
00178 
00179     HOOK_OS_STATISTICS_SWITCH_CONTEXT_STOP();
00180 
00181     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00182         "rete\n\t"
00183     );
00184 #if __ICCAVR32__
00185     #pragma diag_suppress=Pe174
00186 #endif
00187     os_current_process = os_current_process;
00188 #if __ICCAVR32__
00189     #pragma diag_default=Pe174
00190 #endif
00191 }
00192 
00193 #if __GNUC__
00194 __attribute__((__naked__))
00195 void _os_switch_context(void);
00196 void _os_switch_context(void)
00197 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00198     #pragma shadow_registers = full
00199     #pragma exception=0x100,0
00200 __exception void _os_switch_context(void)
00201 #endif
00202 {
00203     extern struct os_process *os_current_process;
00204 
00205     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00206 #if CONFIG_OS_USE_SW_INTERRUPTS == true
00207         // Test if we need to save the context
00208         "cp.w r8, 0\n\t"
00209     #if __ICCAVR32__
00210         "brne bypass_context_save:C\n\t"
00211     #else
00212         "brne bypass_context_save\n\t"
00213     #endif
00214 #endif
00215         // Save context
00216         "pushm r10-r12, lr\n\t" // r10-r12, lr
00217 
00218         "ld.d r10, sp[4*4]\n\t"
00219         "st.d sp[4*4], r8\n\t" // r8-r9
00220         "st.d --sp, r10\n\t" // pc, sr
00221             "pushm r0-r7\n\t" // r0-r7
00222 
00223         // Save the stack pointer
00224         "mov r0, os_current_process\n\t"
00225         "ld.w r1, r0[0]\n\t"
00226         "st.w r1[0], sp\n"
00227 
00228         // Bypass the context saving
00229         "bypass_context_save:"
00230     );
00231 
00232     os_switch_context_hook();
00233 
00234     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00235         // Update the stack pointer
00236         "ld.w sp, r12\n\t"
00237 
00238         // Restore context
00239         "popm r0-r7\n\t" // r0-r7
00240         "ld.d r6, sp++\n\t" // r6 = sr; r7 = pc
00241         "popm lr, r8-r12\n\t" // lr, r8-r12
00242         "st.d --sp, r6\n\t" // stack sr and pc
00243         "ld.d r6, sp[-14*4]\n\t" // restore r6-r7
00244 
00245         // Restore context
00246         "rets\n\t"
00247     );
00248 
00249 #if __ICCAVR32__
00250     #pragma diag_suppress=Pe174
00251 #endif
00252     os_current_process = os_current_process;
00253 #if __ICCAVR32__
00254     #pragma diag_default=Pe174
00255 #endif
00256 }
00257 
00258 bool os_process_context_load(struct os_process *proc, os_proc_ptr_t proc_ptr, os_ptr_t args)
00259 {
00260     PUSH(proc, 0); // R8
00261     PUSH(proc, 0); // R9
00262     PUSH(proc, 0); // R10
00263     PUSH(proc, 0); // R11
00264     PUSH(proc, args); // R12
00265     PUSH(proc, 0); // LR
00266     PUSH(proc, (void *) proc_ptr); // PC
00267     PUSH(proc, CONFIG_OS_DEFAULT_SR_VALUE);
00268     PUSH(proc, 0); // R0
00269     PUSH(proc, 0); // R1
00270     PUSH(proc, 0); // R2
00271     PUSH(proc, 0); // R3
00272     PUSH(proc, 0); // R4
00273     PUSH(proc, 0); // R5
00274     PUSH(proc, 0); // R6
00275     PUSH(proc, 0); // R7
00276 
00277     return true;
00278 }
